subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jaipur?
explanation_en: Hawa Mahal is a famous historical palace located in Jaipur, known for its unique design featuring numerous windows. It is also popularly known as the Wind Palace.

explanation_en: Jaipur is the capital city of Rajasthan.

explanation_en: Jaipur, also known as the Pink City, is the capital city of Rajasthan.
